content: {"name": "Project FIND, Hamilton Senior Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "http://www.projectfind.org/hamilton_center", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "141 W 73rd St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10023", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7790046, "longitude": -73.979766}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 787-7710", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must show proof of age over 60 yrs old"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}]}
